definition: Sikorski (name)/Radosław Sikorski (1950-), Polish conservative politician, foreign minister of Poland from 2007
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Sikorski, for his part, congratulated China on its achievements of economic development.
sentences.chinese: 西科爾斯基對中國取得的經濟發展成就表示祝賀。
